column1: The high  transaction costs were reflected  in interest rates  many times  greater than those available for established businesses in urban areas.

Of course, faster payments would not address t he root causes of financial fragility, but they  could help reduce the strain on some .37   In addition, many small businesses cite immediate access to working capital to finance inventories or pay employees as their number one constraint on growth.
